_meta.source: Researched from LA tourism, Port of Los Angeles, and cruise guides

bbox_hint.note: Covers San Pedro port area, LA landmarks - note distances are significant

transit_routes.name: Walk San Pedro
transit_routes.note: San Pedro waterfront and USS Iowa walkable from cruise terminal.

transit_routes.name: Uber/Lyft to LA
transit_routes.note: LA is spread out. Budget significant time for travel. Traffic can be brutal.

featured_experiences.name: San Pedro & USS Iowa
featured_experiences.note: Best option for limited pre/post cruise time. USS Iowa is excellent WWII museum.

featured_experiences.name: Hollywood Experience
featured_experiences.note: 25+ miles from port. Only attempt with full pre/post cruise day. Tourist-heavy but iconic.

featured_experiences.name: Santa Monica
featured_experiences.note: 30+ miles from port. Beautiful beach and pier. Only with pre/post cruise day.
